item.title: Auto patching?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

pkufast:

I was just wondering is there a way, where everytime i update my client, i dont have to upload it to a uploading site, if there is a way to autopatch it, like check for updates when someone runs it like when it says checking for updates?

There is, you would just have to implement it yourself.

If you’re just changing cache data, then all you have to do is use the JAGGRAB protocol.

If you’re changing the actual client, then you would need to find some creative way of doing it (maybe just a version number in a class, but that could be easily falsified).

My suggestion would be to have a webclient. That way all you have to do is replace the jar on the webserver, and players can instantly see the changes.
